document.heading: Disability Compensation Effective Administration Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-290, the “Disability Compensation Effective Administration Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-873, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 4, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-685 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-290 became effective on April 5, 2005.
